name: vscode-versionlens
description: Shows the latest version for each package using code lens
author: Peter Flannery

commands.title: An error has occurred. Click to see the log for details.

editor/title.when: versionlens.show == false && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerBusy == false && versionlens.providerError == false && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.show && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerBusy == false && versionlens.providerError == false  && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.providerBusy && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerError == false && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.showPrereleases == false && versionlens.show && versionlens.providerActive && textCompareEditorVisible == false

versionlens.suggestions.showOnStartup.description: Show version suggestions by default on vscode start up.

versionlens.suggestions.showPrereleasesO.description: Show version prerelease suggestions by default on vscode start up.

versionlens.suggestions.showSuggestionsS.description: Show the stats of all suggestions in the status bar.

versionlens.suggestions.indicators.description: The indicators used when showing version suggestion statuses.

versionlens.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached. Setting the duration to 0 will disable caching.

versionlens.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned.

versionlens.npm.onSaveChanges.description: A task label defined in your tasks.json that will be executed when you save a package document that has dependency changes. Ensure to set your `task.options.cwd` to the predefined variable called `${fileDirname}` when running an install task

versionlens.npm.files.description: Specifies which files to register with version lenses. You can use [micromatch](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) expressions to match file names. You will need to restart vscode when changing this setting.

versionlens.npm.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.npm.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in package.json should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.npm.prereleaseTagFilter.description: Defines a list of prerelease tags you only want to see. i.e. ['alpha', 'beta']. If you don't specify any prerelease tags then all the prerelease tags newer the the latest version are shown when the 'show prereleases' icon is activated.

versionlens.deno.onSaveChanges.description: A task label defined in your tasks.json that will be executed when you save a package document that has dependency changes. Ensure to set your `task.options.cwd` to the predefined variable called `${fileDirname}` when running an install task

versionlens.deno.files.description: Specifies which files to register with version lenses. You can use [micromatch](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) expressions to match file names. You will need to restart vscode when changing this setting.

versionlens.deno.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.deno.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.deno.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in deno.json should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.deno.prereleaseTagFilter.description: Defines a list of prerelease tags you only want to see. i.e. ['alpha', 'beta']. If you don't specify any prerelease tags then all the prerelease tags newer the the latest version are shown when the 'show prereleases' icon is activated.

versionlens.pnpm.files.description: Specifies which files to register with version lenses. You can use [micromatch](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) expressions to match file names. You will need to restart vscode when changing this setting.

versionlens.pnpm.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in pnpm-workspace.yaml should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.pub.onSaveChanges.description: A task label defined in your tasks.json that will be executed when you save a package document that has dependency changes. Ensure to set your `task.options.cwd` to the predefined variable called `${fileDirname}` when running an install task

versionlens.pub.files.description: Specifies which files to register with version lenses. You can use [micromatch](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) expressions to match file names. You will need to restart vscode when changing this setting.

versionlens.pub.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.pub.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.pub.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in pubspec.yaml should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.pub.apiUrl.description: Defines the pub api to use for package searching.

versionlens.pub.prereleaseTagFilter.description: Defines a list of prerelease tags you only want to see. i.e. ['alpha', 'beta']. If you don't specify any prerelease tags then all the prerelease tags newer the the latest version are shown when the 'show prereleases' icon is activated.

versionlens.dotnet.onSaveChanges.description: A task label defined in your tasks.json that will be executed when you save a package document that has dependency changes. Ensure to set your `task.options.cwd` to the predefined variable called `${fileDirname}` when running an install task

versionlens.dotnet.files.description: Specifies which files to register with version lenses. You can use [micromatch](https://github.com/micromatch/micromatch) expressions to match file names. You will need to restart vscode when changing this setting.

versionlens.dotnet.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.dotnet.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.dotnet.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which project properties should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.dotnet.nuget.sources.description: Defines which nuget source to use for package searching. Has to be a v3 'service index' endpoint. e.g. https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json. Defaults to the sources output by `dotnet nuget list source`

versionlens.dotnet.prereleaseTagFilter.description: Defines a list of prerelease tags you only want to see. i.e. ['alpha', 'beta']. If you don't specify any prerelease tags then all the prerelease tags newer the the latest version are shown when the 'show prereleases' icon is activated.
